Team.metaDescription: Meet the incredible people behind ARC Studio ‚Äî ARC Team.

items.question: What does ARC Studio do?
items.subtitle: Click to expand
items.answer: ARC Studio transforms ideas into memorable digital experiences. We offer design services, application development, interactive experiences, and digital content that connects brands and people.

items.question: What are ARC Studio's differentiators?
items.subtitle: Our difference lies in <bold>creativity and technology</bold>
items.answer: Each project is personalized, innovative, and delivered with attention to detail and excellence.

items.question: How can I request a quote?
items.subtitle: Contact us
items.answer: You can contact us through our <bold>contact form</bold> or official email. Our team will understand your needs and present a personalized proposal.

items.question: Do you work with companies of any size?
items.subtitle: For all company sizes
items.answer: Yes! We work with startups, SMBs, and large companies, adapting our approach to provide solutions for each client.

items.question: What is the average delivery time for a project?
items.subtitle: It depends on the project
items.answer: The timeline varies according to the complexity of the project, but we always seek to deliver high-quality results within a realistic schedule, maintaining constant communication with the client.

About.title: About
About.headline: We transform ideas into memorable digital experiences. At <arc_studio>ARC Studio</arc_studio>, we create solutions that inspire, engage, and connect brands with people in a unique way.
About.intro_paragraph_1: Founded with the goal of redefining standards in the design and technology market, ARC Studio combines creativity, innovation, and strategy to deliver projects that impress and make a difference. Our team of specialists combines artistic talent and technological expertise to create high-impact digital experiences.
About.intro_paragraph_2: Each project is approached with attention to detail, deep understanding of the client's purpose, and a clear vision of how to communicate their message powerfully. We are always ahead of trends, ensuring unique and relevant results.
About.mission_content: Transform ideas into unforgettable experiences, connecting brands and people in meaningful ways.
About.vision_content: To be a reference in creativity and technology, recognized for the excellence and innovation of each project.
About.values_content: Creativity, innovation, collaboration, excellence, and commitment to impactful results.
About.conclusion: At ARC Studio, each project is more than work: it is an opportunity to create something memorable and leave a digital legacy. We are ready to turn your vision into reality, with excellence and innovation in every detail.

Terms.title: üìú Terms and Conditions of Service
Terms.subtitle: We recommend carefully reading all clauses.

1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
1.content: By accessing or using the services offered by ARC Studio, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any of these Terms, please do not use the Services.

content.services: ‚ÄúServices‚Äù refer to all products, software, websites, apps, resources, and features made available by ARC Studio.
content.user: ‚ÄúUser‚Äù refers to any person who accesses or uses the Services.
content.content: ‚ÄúContent‚Äù refers to texts, images, videos, audio, code, or any material provided by ARC Studio or by the User within the scope of the Services.

3.title: 3. Use of Services
3.content: The User agrees to use the Services lawfully and in accordance with all applicable laws. It is prohibited to use the Services to: (a) violate third-party rights; (b) send or share unlawful, offensive, defamatory, discriminatory, or hateful content; (c) commit fraud, phishing, spam, or any malicious activity; (d) attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems, data, or accounts.

4.title: 4. Account Registration and Security
4.content: If it is necessary to create an account to use the Services, the User agrees to provide true, current, and complete information. The User is responsible for protecting their password and access credentials, and for all activities carried out with their account. In case of unauthorized account use, the User must immediately notify ARC Studio.

5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
5.content: All Content made available by ARC Studio, including software, design, text, images, trademarks, logos, and other materials, is protected by copyright, trademarks, and other intellectual property laws. The User does not acquire any rights to this Content, except for the limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Services as permitted by these Terms.

6.title: 6. User Content
6.content: When the User submits or makes Content available through the Services (for example, comments, uploads, created materials), they grant ARC Studio a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, and display that Content as necessary to provide the Services. The User declares that they own or have legal authorization to use and grant this license. ARC Studio may remove or refuse any Content that violates these Terms or applicable laws.

7.title: 7. Payments and Charges (If applicable)
7.content: If any Service is paid, prices, fees, and payment methods will be defined separately. The User agrees to pay all associated fees and accepts that ARC Studio may add, modify, or remove plans with prior notice. There are no refunds unless expressly provided.

8.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
8.content: The Services are provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù and ‚Äúas available‚Äù. ARC Studio does not guarantee that the Services will be uninterrupted, error-free, secure, or suitable for a specific purpose. The User uses the Services at their own risk.

9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
9.content: Under no circumstances will ARC Studio be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, or for loss of data, profits, or revenues, arising from the use of or inability to use the Services, even if advised of the possibility of such damages. ARC Studio's total liability will be limited to the amount actually paid by the User for the Services, if any.

10.title: 10. Suspension and Termination
10.content: ARC Studio reserves the right to suspend or terminate any User's access to the Services at any time and for any reason, especially in case of violation of these Terms. Clauses that by their nature should survive termination (such as Intellectual Property, Limitation of Liability, etc.) will remain in effect after termination.

11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
11.content: ARC Studio may modify these Terms at any time. By continuing to use the Services after modifications, the User agrees to the revised Terms. If you do not agree, you must stop using the Services.

12.title: 12. Privacy and Data
12.content: The use and processing of personal data is governed by ARC Studio's privacy policy. By using the Services, the User agrees to the collection, use, and storage of their data as described in that policy. (If you do not have one, it is recommended to create a separate policy.)

13.title: 13. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
13.content: These Terms shall be governed and interpreted according to the laws in force in Brazil. Any disputes will be resolved in the competent court of the district where ARC Studio is headquartered, unless otherwise provided.

14.title: 14. General Provisions
14.content: Failure to exercise any right or clause of these Terms does not constitute waiver of that right. If any provision of these Terms is considered invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force. These Terms constitute the entire agreement between the User and ARC Studio regarding the Services.

15.title: 15. Contact
15.content: If you have questions, suggestions, or complaints about these Terms or the Services, contact us at: arcstudio.ofical@gmail.com.
